With 19.97 thousands residents , the New_York-Newark-Jersey_City_NY-NJ-PA Metropolitan Areas Seattle-Tacoma-Bellevue_WA the most populous in the U.S. in 2018 .  The Los_Angeles-Long_Beach-Anaheim_CA Angeles , Chicago Dallas , and Houston Metropolitan Areas rounded out the top five in the U.S. What is a Metropolitan Areas ? It may seem strange that a Metropolitan Areas can contain New_York-Newark-Jersey_City_NY-NJ-PA and Areas in different states , such as the New_York-Newark-Jersey_City_NY-NJ-PA metro Areas , but there is a specific reason as to why that is : According to the U.S. Census Bureau , a Metropolitan statistical Areas is either one or more Louisville/Jefferson_County_KY-IN that has a New_York-Newark-Jersey_City_NY-NJ-PA in it with a Population of 50,000 inhabitants or more , or is an Areas defined by the Census with a Population of 100,000 or more .  Metropolitan Areas particularly helpful in tracking demographic change over time in large communities and allow officials to see where the largest pockets of inhabitants Areas in the Louisville/Jefferson_County_KY-IN .

In debitum incrementum ? A Country 's National debt , also known as government debt or Czech_Republic debt , is defined as all borrowings owed by the government of a Country .  It usually comprises internal debt – owed to other governmental departments – and external debt , which is held by the Czech_Republic and is owed to government bond owners .

The fertility rate for All Ethnicity in the U.S. was 1729.5 Births per 1,000 women .  What is the Total fertility rate ? The Total fertility rate is an estimation of the number of children who would theoretically be born per 1,000 women through their childbearing years ( generally considered to be between the ages of 15 and 44 ) according to age-specific fertility rate .

Grammy Awards winners - additional information The Grammy Awards are annually awarded by members of the country National Academy of Recording Arts and Sciences ( NARAS ) in recognition of excellence in the recording arts and sciences .  They are the equivalent of other annual prestigious Awards in the American entertainment industry , such as the Academy Awards - OSCARS ( for motion pictures ) , the Emmy Awards ( for television ) and the Tony Awards ( for stage performance ) .

The statistic shows the Natural rate of population growth by continent in the middle of 2014 .  The Natural rate of population growth in Africa was 2.5 % in the middle of 2014.The Natural rate of population growth arises from the birth rate minus the death rate and without including the effects of migration.Population growth shown in the statistic above , the Natural rate of population growth continues to increase on almost every continent in 2013.Due to medical advances , better living conditions and the increase of agricultural productivity the world population is continuously increasing .  The development of the world population from 1950 to 2030 is estimated to be tripled according to United Nations ' data.The majority of the world population lives in Asia , but the population in Africa is forecasted to rise from 1,031 in year 2010 up to 4,185 in year 2100 .

Since its release in 2011 , Minecraft has recorded worldwide sales of 176 millions unit , making it one of the best-selling games of all time along with other legendary games such as Tetris and Grand Theft Auto V. The popular sandbox game , which is developed by Swedish game publisher , Mojang allows players to build 3D worlds with different types of blocks and then explore and craft items within their new world .  Minecraft - a global hit Minecraft is available across several computer operating systems and was more recently released for console .  Due to the freedom that is afforded players and the infinite Number of ways the game can develop , it still remains popular with fans some eight years after its release .

The statistic shows the U.S. total arms Exports in 2018 expressed in TIV , by country .  The TIV is based on the known unit production costs of a core set of weapons and is intended to represent the transfer of military resources rather than the financial value of the transfer .  The TIV is expressed here in million constant U.S. dollars as of 1990 .

By contrast , the Years with the least births was 1941 when there were just 695 thousand births .  These two figures are undoubtedly linked to the Second World War , with 1941 coming just after the Battle of Britain and 1947 being two Years after the end of the war .

This graph shows the results of the Happy Planet Index 's ranking of the happiest and most environmentally sustainable Country in the world .  The Happy Planet Index measures life expectancy , experienced well-being , inequality of outcomes , and ecological footprint in order to determine the Country that are able to deliver the longest and happiest , but also most sustainable lives to their residents .  The Index works to measure efficiency by ranking Country relative to how they offer their people long and Happy lives , for each unit of environmental output .

This statistic depicts a ranking of Latin America Country based on the degree of inequality in wealth distribution according to the Gini coefficient as of 2017 .  The Gini coefficient measures the deviation of the distribution of income ( or consumption ) among individuals or households in a given Country from a perfectly equal distribution .  A value of 0 represents absolute inequality , whereas 100 would be the highest possible degree of inequality .

Perhaps unsurprisingly , the main Traffic Source for false information online is Social media , which generates 42 % of Fake news Traffic .  The nature of Social networks , most notably the ease of sharing content , allows Fake news to spread at a rapid rate – an issue further exacerbated by the fact that many U.S. adults sometimes believe Fake news to be real .  Fake news : an ongoing problem The presence of Fake news would be less of an issue if users were more aware of how to identify it and were aware of the risks of sharing such content .

Additionally , over half of respondents had either Never_heard_of of the publication or had Heard_of_no_opinion about Breitbart 's credibility .  Conservative view of news media While right-wing websites and online publications have grown in number and popularity in recent years , Fox News remains the largest and perhaps most influential conservative news source in the U.S. .
The term ‘ fake Internet_News_Sites ' is used in multiple different contexts , but officially refers simply to false information presented as legitimate Internet_News_Sites .  Adults in the U.S. believe social media Platform and online Internet_News_Sites to be the most likely sources of fake Internet_News_Sites – 58 % of respondents to a survey believed that Facebook was the most likely place in which The_Daily_Show would encounter false Internet_News_Sites stories , and 49 % said the same about Twitter .  A separate study revealed that 66 % of U.S. adults believed that 76 % or more of the Internet_News_Sites The_Daily_Show saw on social media was biased .

Mosquitoes are by far the Deadliest Creature in the world when it comes to Annual Humans deaths , causing around 750000 deaths per year , compared to 100000 deaths from Snakes and only 6 from Sharks .  Malaria Mosquitoes are the Deadliest Creature in the world because they transmit a number of deadly diseases , the worst of which is malaria .

This statistic displays the monthly Exchange rate ( as of the end of each Month ) of the Euro to the Russian Ruble ( EUR/RUB ) , according to data from the European Central Bank , from 2014 to 2020 .  The concrete , or point in time , measure shows the Exchange rate as of the last day of each Month , which is different to the standardized measure ; calculation of average based on observations throughout the period in question.Monthly Exchange After seeing a height of 85.62 Russian Ruble to the Euro in 2016 , the monthly Exchange rate has fluctuated .  Between 2018 and 2020 , the end of Month Exchange rate between the Euro and Russian Ruble has seen a downward trend .

Multiple factors can play a role in the decision to invest in real estate .  To calculate how prosperous European cities are on the estate market , the Urban Land Institute considered transport connectivity , forecasted real estate returns , a cities 's economic performance , availability of assets/opportunities for new development , market size and liquidity , regulatory environment , digital connectivity , attractiveness to talent , cities leadership , housing affordability , and affordability of space for new/small/growing businesses .  Leading European cities for development and investment According to the ranking , the leading five European cities by overall prospects for 2020 are Paris , Berlin Frankfurt , London and Madrid .

The exhibition Competition__from_within_the_industry The exhibition Competition__from_within_the_industry is a somewhat broad concept , including all organized events to present or display a selection of some type of item .  At one end of the spectrum this includes public exhibition of art or history in a gallery or museum , while at the Competition_with_other_media_(e.g._internet_virtual_trade_shows_social_media) end are Competition_with_other_media_(e.g._internet_virtual_trade_shows_social_media) fairs , where goods and services associated Competition_with_other_media_(e.g._internet_virtual_trade_shows_social_media) a specific Competition__from_within_the_industry are exhibited to invited guests only .

This statistic shows total U.S. arms Import in 2018 expressed in TIV , by country . This statistic displays the average tenancy Void period for rental property in the private rented sector in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from the fourth Quarter of 2013 to the third Quarter of 2019 .  Void period constitute an important measure for the private rental markets , as they are one of the major reasons for the loss of expected rental income .  They require careful planning and budgeting , to keep the time when the property is not bringing the profit to the minimum and to make sure that all necessary expenses are still covered during the Void period .

This statistic depicts the Perceived influences on consumer purchasing of eyewear in the U.S. in 2012 .  The survey revealed that 27 % of the respondents are influences into eyewear purchases as a result of Doctor_recommendation recommendations.Eyewear in the United StatesAfter suffering three consistent years of value sales declines , the eyewear market in the US began to emerge from the depths of the economic recession in 2011 and 2012 .  While the economy remains weaker than it was before the recession , GDP growth , a declining unemployment rate , and increased levels of consumer confidence led consumer to once again invest in vision correction products.Innovative new Product_features launches and pent-up consumer demand to update the style and prescription of their spectacles has helped retail value sales of eyewear to finally return to their pre-recessionary levels in 2012.Contact lenses once again outperformed spectacles in 2012 , continuing a trend that has been ongoing for many years .

The concrete , or point in time , measure shows the Exchange rate as of the last day of each Month , which is different to the standardized measure ; calculation of average based on observations throughout the period in question .  Between the Month of 2016 to 2017 , the monthly Exchange rate of the Euro to the Swiss franc noted an increase with some fluctuation .

Today , the vast majority of the world uses what is known as the Gregorian calendars , Named after Pope Gregory XIII , who introduced it in 1582 .  The Gregorian calendars replaced the Julian calendars , which had been the most used calendars in Europe until this point .  The Gregorian calendars lasts for approximately 365.24 days ; this means that most year have 365 days , with one extra day being added every fourth year , unless the year is divisible by 100 but not 400 ( for example , the year 2000 was a leap year , whereas 2100 and 2200 will not be ) .
This statistic depicts the Physicians density worldwide as of 2013 , by WHO region .  As of that year , the average density in Southeast_Asia stood at 5.9 Physicians per 10,000 inhabitants .  The World average was around 13.9 Physicians per 10,000 inhabitants .

However , it was common to their whom Stranger_met_in_a_particular_context_(disco_gym_holidays_etc.) as well .

This statistic presents the Gross Gaming Revenue ( GGR ) in select European Country in 2018 .  Gross Gaming Revenue ( GGR ) The GGR is a key metric used within the Gaming industry to refer the difference between the amount of money received by a given agent , and the amount of money payed out by the agent .  Sales Revenue can be thought of as a comparable metric from outside the Gaming industry .

This statistic shows the U.S. Small Business Optimism Index Index from 2019 to 2020 .  In 2020 , the Index amounted to 104.3 The Index consists of 10 indicators, derived from questions addressing Small Business Optimism Index owners : Plans to create employment ; plans to make capital outlays ; plans to increase inventories ; expect economy to improve ; expect real sales higher ; current inventory ; current job openings ; expected credit conditions ; now a good time to expand ; earnings trends .
